reviewText:
DVD is a poor quality copy of the VHS tape.. Parts of it are very faded and almost unreadable. Very disappointed in the quality.
Use the tape if it is good condition.

Fantastic documentary.  Clear and mind boggling footage from the early twentieth century following the guideline of Barbara Tuchman's excellent book.  I guess the BBC took great care in preserving the footage from that era.  It is stunning.
